name: soma
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology the whole of an organism except its reproductive cells (= those connected with the process of producing new life): A sharp distinction between soma and germ line makes it possible to prevent acquired characters from being transmitted.
anatomy the central part of a nerve cell that contains the nucleus (= the part of a cell that controls its growth): These nerve cells have three main structural parts – axon, dendrites and soma. See also
axon
dendrite
